result.eng: Thank you for your company tonight.
result.ga: Go raibh maith agaibh as bhur gcomhluadar anocht
result.orig: Go raibh maith agaibh as bhur gcomhluadar anocht
result.html: Go raibh maith agaibh as bhur gcomhluadar anochtThank you for your company tonight.
result.ponchtml: Go raiḃ maiṫ agaiḃ as ḃur gcoṁluadar anoċtThank you for your company tonight.

result.ga: Seans go bhfuil sé seo ar eolas agaibh cheana
result.orig: Seans go bhfuil sé seo ar eolas agaibh cheana
result.html: Seans go bhfuil sé seo ar eolas agaibh cheanaYou may know this already.
result.ponchtml: Seans go ḃfuil sé seo ar eolas agaiḃ ċeanaYou may know this already.

result.html: An bhfuil clann agaibhDo you [plur.] have children?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil clann agaiḃDo you [plur.] have children?

result.eng: Do you have a special price for a family?
result.ga: An bhfuil praghas speisialta agaibh do chlann
result.orig: An bhfuil praghas speisialta agaibh do chlann
result.html: An bhfuil praghas speisialta agaibh do chlannDo you have a special price for a family?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil praġas speisialta agaiḃ do ċlannDo you have a special price for a family?

result.ga: An bhfuil aithne agaibh ar mo dheirfiúr
result.orig: An bhfuil aithne agaibh ar mo dheirfiúr
result.html: An bhfuil aithne agaibh ar mo dheirfiúrDo you know my sister?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil aiṫne agaiḃ ar mo ḋeirfiúrDo you know my sister?

result.eng: I am leaving to go watch the football match now, bye.
result.ga: Beidh mise ag imeacht le dul ag féachaint ar an gcluiche peile anois slán agaibh
result.orig: Beidh mise ag imeacht le dul ag féachaint ar an gcluiche peile anois slán agaibh
result.html: Beidh mise ag imeacht le dul ag féachaint ar an gcluiche peile anois slán agaibhI am leaving to go watch the football match now, bye.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ mise ag imeaċt le dul ag féaċaint ar an gcluiċe peile anois slán agaiḃI am leaving to go watch the football match now, bye.

result.html: Tá neart ama agaibhYou have plenty of time.
result.ponchtml: Tá neart ama agaiḃYou have plenty of time.

result.eng: I saw the announcement that you had in the paper and I am interested in the position.
result.ga: Chonaic mé an fógra a bhí agaibh sa bpáipéar agus tá suim agam sa bpost
result.orig: Chonaic mé an fógra a bhí agaibh sa bpáipéar agus tá suim agam sa bpost
result.html: Chonaic mé an fógra a bhí agaibh sa bpáipéar agus tá suim agam sa bpostI saw the announcement that you had in the paper and I am interested in the position.
result.ponchtml: Ċonaic mé an fógra a ḃí agaiḃ sa bpáipéar agus tá suim agam sa bpostI saw the announcement that you had in the paper and I am interested in the position.

result.html: Cén post atá agaibhWhat job do you have?
result.ponchtml: Cén post atá agaiḃWhat job do you have?

result.eng: What sort of lodging did you have?
result.ga: Cén sórt lóistín a bhí agaibh
result.orig: Cén sórt lóistín a bhí agaibh
result.html: Cén sórt lóistín a bhí agaibhWhat sort of lodging did you have?
result.ponchtml: Cén sórt lóistín a ḃí agaiḃWhat sort of lodging did you have?

result.eng: How may of you were there?
result.ga: Cá mhéad duine agaibh a bhí ann
result.orig: Cá mhéad duine agaibh a bhí ann
result.html: Cá mhéad duine agaibh a bhí annHow may of you were there?
result.ponchtml: Cá ṁéad duine agaiḃ a ḃí annHow may of you were there?

result.eng: Which of you is older, you or Siobhán?
result.ga: Cé acu duine agaibh is sine tusa nó Siobhán
result.orig: Cé acu duine agaibh is sine tusa nó Siobhán
result.html: Cé acu duine agaibh is sine tusa nó SiobhánWhich of you is older, you or Siobhán?
result.ponchtml: Cé acu duine agaiḃ is sine tusa nó SioḃánWhich of you is older, you or Siobhán?

result.eng: Which one of you is older?
result.ga: Cé acu duine agaibh is sine
result.orig: Cé acu duine agaibh is sine
result.html: Cé acu duine agaibh is sineWhich one of you is older?
result.ponchtml: Cé acu duine agaiḃ is sineWhich one of you is older?

result.eng: There are three of you in the house, then.
result.ga: Triúr agaibh atá sa teach mar sin
result.orig: Triúr agaibh atá sa teach mar sin
result.html: Triúr agaibh atá sa teach mar sinThere are three of you in the house, then.
result.ponchtml: Triúr agaiḃ atá sa teaċ mar sinThere are three of you in the house, then.

result.html: An bhfuil páistí agaibhDo you have children?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil páistí agaiḃDo you have children?

result.html: Slán codlata agaibhGood-bye and good night.
result.ponchtml: Slán codlata agaiḃGood-bye and good night.

result.eng: It's midnight. Good night to y'all.
result.ga: Tá an meán oíche ann Slán codlata agaibh
result.orig: Tá an meán oíche ann Slán codlata agaibh
result.html: Tá an meán oíche ann Slán codlata agaibhIt's midnight. Good night to y'all.
result.ponchtml: Tá an meán oíċe ann Slán codlata agaiḃIt's midnight. Good night to y'all.
